Hi all. I have just started to use Heritrix 1.12.1
and roughly succeeded in=
 simple crawls.

Now I'm switching to control the scope of my crawl finely.=

I added some rules rejecting unwilling URIs in LinkScoper.
It causes java.=
lang.ClassCastException in the processor 'Scheduler'.

I have not read sour=
ces but I am wondering that 
LinkScoper converts Links comming from link ex=
tractors
to CandidateURI which Scheduler needs.

Could anyone tell me wheth=
er rejecting URIs in LinkScoper 
is correct use or not ? If it is incorrect=
, should I reject
unwilling URIs in the Scheduler (Scheduler#decide-rules) =

which comes just after LinkScoper module.

Thanks.

Takashi SASAKI
